00012 OSMRelation::OSMRelation( OSMMap* parent, int id, bool visible )

00020 void OSMRelation::addMember( OSMRelationMember member )
00021 { 
00022   m_members.append( member ); 
00023 }
00024 
00025 void OSMRelation::addMember( QXmlStreamReader &xml )
00026 {
00027   OSMRelationMember::Type type;
00028   if( xml.attributes().value( "type" ) == "way" )
00029     type = OSMRelationMember::Way;
00030   else
00031     type = OSMRelationMember::Node;
00032   
00033   addMember( OSMRelationMember( type, xml.attributes().value( "ref" ).toString().toInt() ) );
00034 }

00038   return m_members; 
00039 }

00042 { 
00043   return member.type(); 
00044 }

00046 OSMRelationMember::Type OSMRelation::getMemberType( int i ) 
00047 {
00048   return getMemberType( m_members.at( i ) ); 
00049 }

00051 OSMNode* OSMRelation::getMemberNode( OSMRelationMember member )
00052 {
00053   if( member.type() == OSMRelationMember::Node )
00054     return m_parent->getNodeById( member.ref() );
00055   else
00056     return 0;
00057 }
00058 
00059 OSMNode* OSMRelation::getMemberNode( int i ) 
00060 {
00061   return getMemberNode( m_members.at( i ) );
00062 }
00063 
00064 OSMWay* OSMRelation::getMemberWay( OSMRelationMember member )
00065 {
00066   if( member.type() == OSMRelationMember::Way )
00067     return m_parent->getWayById( member.ref() );
00068   else
00069     return 0;
00070 }
